info.summary:
Dmitri A. Dolgov works as a Senior Research Scientist in AI & Robotics group at the Toyota Research Institute in Ann Arbor, MI, and his\her h-index is 18, g-index is 42. His\Her interests are :
 Markov Decision Proc...; Autonomous Vehicle; Path Planning; Resource Allocation; Autonomous Driving;
